city.name: France, Paris
city.description: The city I would love to visit is the capital city of France, Paris, which is known for its art museums and architectural landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower, which is the tallest structure in Paris.

foreignLanguage.description: I would love to learn the foreign language French as it is the second most widely learned foreign language after English and regarded as one of the most romancised languages.
